CustomField.formula: if ( (isblank(ClosedDate)==true) , TEXT( FLOOR( Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) ) & " Jours " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " Heures " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes" , TEXT( FLOOR( Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) ) & " Jours " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " Heures " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (Duree_de_la_requete__c /1440 ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes" )
CustomField.label: Dur√©e
